name: Seiya Imoto
content: Seiya Imoto Seiya Imoto Ph.D. JAPANESE PAGE IS HERE Professional Record May 2015 -- Present Professor Division of Health Medical Data Science, Health Intelligence Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo February 2007 -- April 2015 Associate Professor Laboratory of DNA Information Analysis, Human Genome Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo December 2001 -- February 2007 Assistant Professor Laboratory of DNA Information Analysis, Human Genome Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo April 2001 -- November 2001 Post Doctoral Fellow Laboratory of DNA Information Analysis, Human Genome Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo January 1999 -- March 2001 Research Fellow of the Japan Society of the Promotion of Science for Young Scientists (DC2, Statistical Science, Kyushu University) Academic Record April 1998 -- March 26, 2001 Graduate School of Mathematics, Kyushu University Degree : Doctor of Science April 1996 -- March 1998 Graduate School of Mathematics, Kyushu University Degree : Master of Science April 1992 -- March 1996 Department of Mathematics, Undergraduate School, Kyushu University Degree : Bachelor of Science Others Member of Japan Statistical Society WEB Member of Japanese Society of Applied Statistics WEB Member of Biometric Society of Japan (Council member 2003.1--2006.12) WEB Member of International Society for Computational Biology WEB Member of Japanese Society for Bioinformatics WEB Part-time lecturer of Graduate School of Medicine, Kurume University (2004.4--) Part-time lecturer of JST BioMedical Omics (BMO) Information, Tokyo Medical and Dental University (2006--) Part-time lecturer of Kyoto University (2007.4--) Lecturer of Education and Research Organization for Genome Information Science (2002.4--2007.3) Lecturer of Kanagawa Academy of Science and Technology (KAST) (2002--2006) Part-time lecturer of Research Institute for Radiation Biology and Medicine, Hiroshima University (2003.4--2004.3) Guest Associate Professor of Medical Research Institute, Tokyo Medical and Dental University (2011.5--2015.4) Guest Professor of Medical Research Institute, Tokyo Medical and Dental University (2015.5--) Editorial Board Member of JP Journal of Biostatistics (2006 --) Assosiate Editor of Computational and Mathematical Methods in Medicine (2010 --) Assosiate Editor of Japanese Journal of Applied Statistits (2006 --) Editor of Japanese Journal of Applied Statistits (2014 --) Assosiate Editor of Japanese Journal of Biometrics (2009 --) Research Publications: Papers Presentations: at International Conference (Publications and Presentations in Japanese are compiled in JAPANESE PAGE) Grant: See JAPANESE PAGE. Contact Division of Health Medical Data Science, Health Intelligence Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo 4-6-1 Shirokanedai, Minato-ku, Tokyo 108-8639 Japan Phone: +81-3-5449-5615 Fax: +81-3-5449-5442 E-mail: imoto[at]ims.u-tokyo.ac.jp
